The "csm" directory contains the Canonical Scan Matching tools of Andrea Censi [1], as patched and packaged for ROS by Ivan Dryanovski and William Morris, from ccny_scan_tools ROS groovy branch.

[1] A. Censi, "An ICP variant using a point-to-line metric" Proceedings of the IEEE International Conference on Robotics and Automation (ICRA), 2008

[2] https://github.com/ccny-ros-pkg/scan_tools/tree/groovy
